excerpt: "There was a bit of extra excitement in the San Francisco Bay Area traffic last year when a baby sea lion decided it was time to checkout rush hour activities and so wandered or waddled onto the hectic and perilous Highway 101 (a similar occurrence happened a few years ago in northward Mendocino County)."
